text:
I’m just going to leave this song here for two reasons:
1. My kids love it (and its stuck in my head)
2. <@UDEASNWEB> will most likely roll her eyes at me and say “typical AJ” 
<https://open.spotify.com/track/0FazGsmQ8ePh8nU91BdVG2?si=78b47405b70d45ea>
dude i saw “kacey musgraves” and did EXACTLY THAT
to be fair, she’s a fabulous singer. it’s that “follow your arrow” song that drives me nuts. like, a 14yo would find it profound, but… yeah
this version isn’t nearly as hideous as i ~hoped~ thought it would be
yea, its 1000 times better than the original. Its the only version I can stand.
Yep, she’s a fantastic singer. Also, totally agree, the follow your arrow song was great and then was insanely overplayed lol
